cause.description:
Promoting awareness and social responsibility of all New Zealanders. In memorium of baby Nia Glassie and others like her (Delcelia Wittika, Kahui twins, Lillybing...) who have suffered at the hands of those they should have been able to trust the most.
1. Every child deserves love and nurturing.
2. Being a 'nosey neighbour' might just protect a childs life. A child's life is worth so much more than the risk of embarrasment from wrongly reporting someone.
3. Our children are our future, they are humans and if they're own families can't love and protect them, we should!
cause.mission: Promote awareness and help prevent child abuse.
cause.name: Stop Child Abuse Now
